author: Quinn
content: I'm glad you're going to finish the book. I searched for it at the SoFo site and was disappointed to see that there was none there. In the end, it's probably better if you take your time, relax, and create the book you envisioned. There's something kinda cool about shoving so much work into a small period of time (I procrastinated and did mine in 5 days -- it was a nightmare), but I think the books usually suffer some serious deficiencies in layout, design, and sequencing. Doesn't mean it's not worth participating, but I agree with your decision... because I want to see what you create. ðŸ™‚
